description: I have a very spacious apartment for you to recharge in. My place is conveniently located half a block away from the Clinton-Washington subway stop that will take you into Manhattan in less than 15 minutes. A short walk to Fort Greene Park, Fort Greene Flea market, and tons of great bars and restaurants. You will be super comfortable here!
name: Spacious, Trendy, and Super Comfortable Apartment!
review: Nilu's flat is well-equipped and very neat, clean, and comfortable.  I particularly enjoyed having an elevator and being so close to the subway (1/2 block) since I went to Manhatten 3 times in 2 days.  Also I found parking less than a block away.  A great place!
